playdate: 2024-11-14(阿姆斯特丹国际纪录片影展)
introduction: IDFA DocLab Competition for Digital StorytellingWhat kind of world will we leave for future generations? Thinking about the future tends to feel abstract and remote. Until you’ve taken part in Ancestors, that is.In this interactive experience you embark on a thrilling, collective journey six generations into the future. Using your smartphone and AI, connections are created between you and others in the room. Together you’ll explore the challenges of tomorrow, discovering howcollaboration is key to shaping a better world.Participants will be immersed in a fun and thought-provoking adventure that brings people together in an entirely new way.
